DataElement.preferredName: Symptom Distress Scale Appearance Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of the degree of distress they experience related to their appearance, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms._A question about an individual's concern with their physical appearance._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A patient reported questionnaire composed of rating scales developed to measure the degree of distress experienced by the patient for specific symptoms.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about an individual's concern with their physical appearance.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's concern with their physical appearance.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Symptom Distress Scale Appearance Score 5 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores from 1 (My appearance has basically not changed) to 5 (The worsening of my physical appearance is a constant, preoccupying concern) on a Likert scale used on the Symptom Distress Scale questionnaire.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: The worsening of my physical appearance is a constant, preoccupying concern

ValueMeaning.preferredName: The worsening of my physical appearance is a constant, preoccupying concern
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that the worsening of an individual's physical appearance is or was a constant, preoccupying concern.

Concepts.longName: Worsening of Physical Appearance is Constant Preoccupying Concern
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that the worsening of an individual's physical appearance is or was a constant, preoccupying concern.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Most of the time I am concerned that my physical appearance is worsening

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Most of the time I am concerned that my physical appearance is worsening
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that most of the time an individual is or was concerned that their physical appearance is worsening.

Concepts.longName: Most of the Time Concerned that Physical Appearance is Worsening
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that most of the time an individual is or was concerned that their physical appearance is worsening.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: I am not often concerned that my appearance is worsening

ValueMeaning.preferredName: I am not often concerned that my appearance is worsening
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is not or was not often concerned that their appearance is worsening.

Concepts.longName: Not Often Concerned that Appearance is Worsening
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is not or was not often concerned that their appearance is worsening.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Occasionally I am concerned about the worsening of my physical appearance

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Occasionally I am concerned about the worsening of my physical appearance
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was occasionally concerned about worsening of their physical appearance.

Concepts.longName: Occasionally Concerned about Worsening of Physical Appearance
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was occasionally concerned about worsening of their physical appearance.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: My appearance has basically not changed

ValueMeaning.preferredName: My appearance has basically not changed
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual's appearance has not changed.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual's appearance has not changed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SDS User's Manual
ReferenceDocuments.description: Documentation of the development, method of administration,  scoring procedures and psychometric properties of the SDS.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Using PRO/HRQoL Measures
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is part of a full set of items that comprise a PRO/HRQoL measure. The full set must be used without any changes to the questions or value set in order to retain the validity and reliability associated with the measure.  The URL citation is provided so that caDSR users can obtain materials related to instructions for administering and/or scoring the measure. Changes may not be made to these documents.  Where an investigator wants to use single Patient Reported Outcome items that are integrated into a study, DCP review is required prior to inclusion of the item on a case report form.
